fbopen

FBOpen helps small businesses search for opportunities to work with the U.S. government.

For Developers

Here you can find a range of web services and, as we work to make this better, related developer resources.

APIs by Bureau

Bureau of Land Management

  • Geocommunicator
  • Geocommunicator Map and Web Services
  • General Land Office Web Services
  • Landscape ARCGIS Server

Bureau of Ocean Energy Management

  • Marine Cadastre ARCGIS Server
  • Marine Cadastre ARCGIS Server Documentation

  • FWS Data Store API
  • Environmental Conservation Online System web services
  • Fish & Wildlife Service ARCGIS Service
  • Critical Habitat Portal

National Park Service

  • NPS Data Store API
  • ArcGIS Server REST API
  • NPMap API

  • USGS Beta API Library
  • Eastern Geographic Science Center Map Web Services
  • Grand Canyon Monitoring and Research Center
  • Map-A-Planet: Web Map Service
  • National Atlas Web Map Services
  • NationalMap.gov Web Services
  • ScienceBase API
  • Streamstats web services
  • Water Quality Portal Web Services
  • Water Services
  • ScienceBase Web Services

Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement

  • OSMRE ARCGIS Server
